resources.string:
Open Speed Cleaner here to: 
1. Boost phone speed by 50% 
2. Kill power draining apps 
3. Clean system junks & cache 
4. Reduce 50% power consumption, prolong phone standby time 
 
We sincerely promise: 
Speed Cleaner will NEVER collect any privacy information. 
 
Please note that: 
There is a standard confirmation procedure when enabling Accessibility Service on all Android device. If you receive these privacy warnings, just ignore them please.
